info.task: read information about empty expanded combobox
info.title: Read information about an empty, expanded combobox in reading mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToAndExpandCombobox
setupScript.description: sets focus on and expands the Combobox

user: With the reading cursor on the combobox, read information about the combobox.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the combobox, read information about the combobox.
instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.

assertions.expectation: Name of the combobox ('State') is conveyed
State of the combobox (expanded) is conveyed
The ability to enter or edit text is conveyed
The presence of autocomplete behavior is conveyed
